description: This file defines an interface ILocalStore in C++ for a local storage component, including methods for opening storage, managing tables, setting limits, retrieving entry counts and entries, removing entries, and adding entries. It also defines a shared pointer alias for this interface.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: An interface for local storage operations, including methods for opening, creating tables, setting limits, fetching entries, removing entries, and adding entries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens the local store at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the local store.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in a specified table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries in a table starting from a specified index, up to a maximum count.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves a list of entries from a table starting at a specified index.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries from a table within a specified range.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a specified table.
